targets.expr: sum(rate(nextjs_http_request_duration_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", worker_id=~"$workerId"} [2m])) / sum(rate(nextjs_http_request_duration_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", worker_id=~"$workerId"} [2m]))  > 0

panels.description: If the CPU Usage is not shown, please check the query in the panel "CPU Usage" in the dashboard "General/Kubernetes/Compute Resources/Pod" to see whether "sum_rate" is used instead of "sum_irate".  If it is the case, please update sum_irate in Query A in this panel to sum_rate.
panels.title: CPU Usage

targets.expr: sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container="nextjs-app"}[5m])) by (pod) /sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container="nextjs-app"}[5m])) by (pod)

sum(rate(nextjs_http_request_duration_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", worker_id=~"$workerId"} [2m])) by (pod) / sum(rate(nextjs_http_request_duration_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", worker_id=~"$workerId"} [2m])) by (pod)  > 0
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(nextjs_http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", worker_id=~"$workerId"}[2m])) by (pod,le)) > 0

sum(rate(nextjs_backend_request_duration_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", worker_id=~"$workerId", hostname=~".*query-app.*"} [2m]))  / sum(rate(nextjs_backend_request_duration_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", worker_id=~"$workerId", hostname=~".*query-app.*"} [2m]))

sum(rate(nextjs_backend_request_duration_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", worker_id=~"$workerId", hostname=~".*ts-app.*"} [2m])) / sum(rate(nextjs_backend_request_duration_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", worker_id=~"$workerId", hostname=~".*ts-app.*"} [2m]))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(nextjs_backend_request_duration_seconds_bucket{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", worker_id=~"$workerId", hostname=~".*query-app.*"}[2m])) by (le)) > 0
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(nextjs_backend_request_duration_seconds_bucket{ namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", worker_id=~"$workerId", hostname=~".*ts-app.*"}[2m])) by (le)) > 0

sum(rate(nextjs_http_request_duration_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", worker_id=~"$workerId"} [2m])) by (worker_id) / sum(rate(nextjs_http_request_duration_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", worker_id=~"$workerId"} [2m])) by (worker_id)  > 0

sum(nodejs_gc_duration_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", worker_id=~"$workerId"}) by (kind, worker_id) / sum(nodejs_gc_duration_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", pod=~"$pod", worker_id=~"$workerId"}) by (kind,worker_id)
